title: I currently have an iPhone 11 Pro Max, should I trade in to get the iPhone 12 Pro Max when it comes out? - Quora

response.answer_text: In general the newer phones are better, but since the 12 hasn’t been announced let along released you really only have two ways to have it. (1) you work at Apple, and the phone is nice even if it might be running a very early iOS 15 now, and that can be buggy…but it is inconvenient to use as you will need written approval from two levels up in your management chain and to have an Apple physical security expert (I.e. one of those ex-military guys) escort you if you ever want to use it outside of Apple’s offices. Or maybe they have rolled that back to an earlier era’s rules and you need to keep it in one of three specific brands of gun safe (Apple provided) while working at home due to COVID-19. Either way this isn’t the phone you are just casually going for a stroll. (2) you stole it, and now you need to worry that you will be found out and maybe go to jail or at least face a civil suit. Neither seem like fun. So in both cases at the moment the 11 is better. After the 12 comes out it is very likely to be better.

The iPhone 12 Pro Max doesn’t exist, so there is no way to answer this question. But each new model is always better than the previous one, so it is likely that it will be. It’s looking like November now before we can know for sure.
